name: Dart Project Management
description: Integrates with Dart's project management platform, enabling direct task and document management through a set of...

metadata.readme_excerpt:
Dart MCP Server

[Dart](https://dartai.com?nr=1) is Project Management powered by AI. > [!WARNING] > The Dart local MCP server is deprecated in favor of the simplified and improved hosted Dart MCP server, which you can [configure with these instructions](https://help.dartai.com/en/articles/10733406).
Deprecated information `dart-mcp-server` is the official AI [Model Context Protocol (MCP)](https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol) server for Dart. - [Features](#features) - [Prompts](#prompts) - [Resource templates](#resource-templates) - [Tools](#tools) - [Task management](#task-management) - [Document management](#document-management) - [Setup](#setup) - [Find the MCP settings file for the client](#find-the-mcp-settings-file-for-the-client) - [Claude Desktop](#claude-desktop) - [Claude Code](#claude-code) - [Cursor](#cursor) - [Cline](#cline) - [Windsurf](#windsurf) - [Any other client](#any-other-client) - [Set up the MCP server](#set-up-the-mcp-server) - [Variant: setup with Docker](#variant-setup-with-docker) - [Help and Resources](#help-and-resources) - [Contributing](#contributing) - [License](#license) ##
